# cover.wset_cover_greedy { #geomcover.cover.wset_cover_greedy }

`cover.wset_cover_greedy(subsets, weights)`

Computes an approximate solution to the weighted set cover problem via a greedy approach.

## Parameters

| Name      | Type      | Description                                                                         | Default    |
|-----------|-----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `subsets` | sparray   | (n x J) sparse matrix of ``J`` subsets whose union forms a cover over ``n`` points. | _required_ |
| `weights` | ArrayLike | (J)-length array of subset weights.                                                 | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type   | Description                                                                         |
|--------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| tuple  | pair (s, c) where ``s`` is an array indicating cover membership and ``c`` its cost. |
